title: Afghan evacuees on terror watchlists stopped from entering U.S., Mayorkas says
content:
1. Afghan evacuees on terror watchlists stopped from entering U.S., Mayorkas says  NBC News
  2. US expects to admit more than 50,000 evacuated Afghans  Yahoo News
  3. DHS promises to 'swiftly and safely' resettle Afghans into US, confirms some flagged evacuees denied entry  Fox News
  4. As children of Vietnamese refugees, we believe Trudeau must do more for Afghan migrants and refugees  Toronto Star
  5. DHS chief: Vetting of Afghan evacuees is 'robust'  Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Afghan evacuees on terror watchlists stopped from entering U.S., Mayorkas says  NBC News
US expects to admit more than 50,000 evacuated Afghans  Yahoo News
DHS promises to 'swiftly and safely' resettle Afghans into US, confirms some flagged evacuees denied entry  Fox News

localize.title: テロリストに登録されたアフガン人避難民の米国入国を阻止、マヨルカ氏が発表
马约尔卡斯说，被列入恐怖观察名单的阿富汗撤离人员被阻止进入美国
馬約爾卡斯說，被列入恐怖觀察名單的阿富汗撤離人員被阻止進入美國
